skins.shipDescription: Gridley-class destroyer - Craven, Hull Number DD-382!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Craven, second ship of the Gridley-class, at your command. As a high speed torpedo destroyer, I was active in the Pacific theater with my little sisters, mainly tasked with night battle support.
skins.acquisition: Second ship of the Gridley-class, Craven, reporting in. Leave the halftime cheering to me!
skins.login: Leave today's halftime cheering to me, Commander!
skins.details: Ahh~ Commander! D-don't get so close all of a sudden!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even if it's time to rest, we've got to keep fighting and dancing. Never give up!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Northampton thinks she can take me down? Hmph!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I can feel your encouragement. I'll work even harder!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: E-even if you're just trying to encourage me, there's... there's this thing called being too passionate!

skins.shipDescription: I much rather cheer for my Commander than go to class...but no matter where I go, I will definitely give it my all! Commander, wait for me to come back as the top student of this school year.
skins.acquisition: I much rather cheer for my Commander than go to class...but no matter where I go, I will definitely give it my all! Commander, wait for me to come back as the top student of this school year.
skins.secretaryIdle1: When you are overwhelmed by all this learning, go for a jog to relax yourself!
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you're struggling with the material, then find a tutor. If that doesn't work, get special training...nothing can’t be solved through special training!
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Commander has always been the best in my heart, so I have to be in his heart, too!
skins.secretaryTouch: These courses are too hard...Commander, can you tutor me?
